content:
lorenzo Trujillo assistant dean of the CU law school was named  Latino Lawyer of the Year by the Hispanic National Bar Association PERIOD

Gilbert Roman judge in the Colorado Court of Appeals nominated Trujillo for the award PERIOD

I cannot think of a more deserving individual who has impacted significant issues affecting Latinos in the United States and the profession Roman wrote in his nominating statement PERIOD

After all the nominations were sent in a national panel reviewed all the submissions and selected the top candidate PERIOD The name was sent to the National Hispanic Bar Association for confirmation PERIOD

Trujillo said he feels humbled to receive such a prestigious award PERIOD

Among all the Latino lawyers to be selected is overwhelming Trujillo said PERIOD I never dreamed of receiving such an award. trujillo said he came into law as a second career PERIOD He was a public school administrator for Jefferson County School District in Colorado PERIOD Then he went into law and finally returned to public schools in a different capacity PERIOD

Trujillo became the attorney for the Adams County School District and also worked on the Colorado Lawyers Committee PERIOD While working for the school district he said he advised the state legislature to revise truancy suspension and expulsion PERIOD

Trujillo said he also worked to make it illegal for students to be thrown out of school without a probable cause PERIOD The model he helped create received national attention and gave him notoriety PERIOD Trujillo even received a personally written letter from First Lady Laura Bush PERIOD

Trujillo has many published works through the Aspen Institute PERIOD One focuses on making the law bar exam more modern PERIOD

Trujillo teaches two classes legal drafting in Spanish for family law and professors for externs PERIOD He is also the supervisor for law students working at internships in the state nationally and internationally PERIOD

Lorenzo Trujillo does not just talk the talk on behalf the Latino Community he walks the walk Roman wrote PERIOD
